directions: In a large skillet over high heat, add 2 tablespoons oil and flour to the pan, and whisk together quickly. Continue cooking and stirring until a dark roux  forms. Stir in shrimp. Cook and stir for a few minutes, until the shrimp turns pink. Set aside.

In another pan, heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium heat.  Stir in okra and onions; cook until okra is tender.  Mix in tomatoes.  Add water, bay leaf, garlic, salt, red pepper, and the shrimp mixture.  Cover, and cook slowly for 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 pounds medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Shrimp Gumbo
